verbs.description: sf [V: stand] - up [ARG1: paddle event] postponed the red bull heavy water considered by many to be the most challenging stand - up paddle surfing contest in the world has been postponed until next year the san francisco event had a window running through friday but forecasts called for unfavorable conditions this was to be the first year women were to compete alongside men in the event beginning at aquatic park continuing underneath the golden gate bridge and concluding at ocean beach sports columnist bruce jenkins aquatic park national basketball association u s tennis ocean beach san francisco chronicle san francisco nba wimbledons golden gate bridge bruce sterling jenkins
